p: The IgM test values (S/CO) at the time of a negative PCR test result varied from a completely non-reactive value (< 1.2 S/CO) up to very strong reactivity (6.0 S/CO) (Fig. 2). IgM and IgG response was typically observed during the second week post onset of illness (Fig. 3). IgM persisted for several months, with S/CO values peaking approximately 4 weeks post onset, and declining by the time of 8 weeks post onset.
